SEARCH
Package no.ntnu.idatg1002.budgetapplication.backend

Class MoneyAction

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatg1002.budgetapplication.backend.MoneyAction
Direct Known Subclasses:
Expense, Income
@Entity public abstract class MoneyAction extends Object
Represents a money action in the budget application, serving as a superclass for Expense and Income classes. MoneyAction instances store information about the amount, description, and recurring-type of a financial transaction.

  • Constructor Details

    • MoneyAction

      protected MoneyAction(int amount, String description, RecurringType type) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs a MoneyAction object with the specified amount, description, and recurring type.
      Parameters:
      amount - the monetary amount, must be non-negative
      description - a non-empty, non-blank description of the action
      type - the recurring type of the action
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the amount is negative or the description is empty or blank

      Default constructor for MoneyAction. Used by DB.
